title: ISic001633. I.Sicily inscription 001633
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΕΝΘΑΔΕΚΙΤΕ
2ΟΠΑΝΦΙΛ
3ΗΤΟΣΚΑΙΣ
4ΟΦΟΣΚΑΙΠΑ
5ΣΙΝΑΡΕΣΤΟΣ
6ΕΥΔΕΜΩΝΕΙΑΤΡ
7ΟΣΕΖΗΣΕΝΕΤΗΕ
8Ξ´ΚΑΙΑΠΕΘΑΝ[.]
9ΜΕΤΑ[..]ΟΦΗΜ
10[..]ΑΖ´christogram

Apparatus criticus

Text partly after SEG and partly after photo in Arias 1937, but not yet fully checked; Agnello: [Ἐ]νθάδε
4: Arias: line omitted

Italian translation

Qui giace l'amatissimo e saggio e a tuti caro Eudemone medico; visse 65 anni e mori il giorno 7 di Phaophi

commentary

bibliography

  • 65.0791 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796

  • Ferrua ap Calderini 1940 248 no. 1105
  • Di Vita 1950 99-100 no.1 ph https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002029
  • Rizzo 1989 64 n.24
  • Manganaro 2002 635-636 fig.33 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001803
  • Rizzone ap. Di Stefano 2013 22-23 ph https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002031
  • Manganaro 1993 564 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001827
